nodes.text: Serres Sarrano was a towering city in Sullust, built in a dormant volcano called Mount Sarrano. The city housed millions of inhabitants and contained enormous factories dedicated to manufacturing and shipbuilding, as well as refineries and powerplants. In their downtime, most blue collar workers of Serres Sarrano sought diversion with racing of any kind. The Serres Sarrano podracing course was located on its outskirts.
